page.title: 15FARMING IN CONNEL AREA
page.content: SAULMORE FARM _has an area of 1000 acres.It is over 100 years old. Three people work on it.There are 45 cows and 45 calves and 1 bull.There are two breeds of cattle_Cross Angus and a few Freesian.There are some sheep and some poultry and part of the land is given over to arable farming.The machinery used includes _tractors,ploughs,potato diggers,rotovators,transport box etc. FISH FARM _the fish come by lorry from England and are put out into the cages where they are fed on small pellets. Fifty or more fish are sold each day that the shop is open. Opening times are _Wednesday 1530_1700 Friday 1530_1700 Saturday 1000_1700 Salmon cost 90p for 1/4lb. Trout cost Â£1.80 for 1lb.
